name: Rec and Parkour
description: Parkour is designed to emphasize free running and movement. It is a physical training discipline that conditions your body to overcome any obstacle in your path. One will build strength, agility and puzzle-solving skills while taking this highly unique class.
fullDescription: Parkour is designed to emphasize free running and movement. It is a physical training discipline that conditions your body to overcome any obstacle in your path. One will build strength, agility and puzzle-solving skills while taking this highly unique class.
whatTheyOffer: Parkour is designed to emphasize free running and movement. It is a physical training discipline that conditions your body to overcome any obstacle in your path. One will build strength, agility and puzzle-solving skills while taking this highly unique class.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: San Francisco Recreation and Park Department
